featured.text: Google, which already uses prototypes of such cars to ferry its staff along Californian freeways, once put a blind man in a prototype and filmed him being driven off to buy takeaway hamburgers.

definition.zh_def: 原型；樣本，通常用於測試或展示的初步模型。
definition.en_def: A preliminary model of something from which other forms are developed or copied.
definition.example: The engineers created a prototype of the new smartphone to test its features.
